bio.singa.mathematics.graphs.model

Interface Edge<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,? extends Vector,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    NodeType - The type of the node to connect with this edge.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEdge, AutomatonEdge, DirectedEdge, DirectedWeightedEdge, DynamicProgrammingEdge, GenericEdge, GridEdge, MoleculeBond, ReactionGraphEdge, UndirectedEdge

    public interface Edge<NodeType extends Node<NodeType,? extends Vector,?>>
    The edge object connects two nodes of the same type.

    • Method Summary
